name: White Dragon
description: White Dragon is a pure indica strain bred by Eva Seeds through crossing Northern Lights and an Afghani indica. The result is a strain so potent, White Dragon won Spannabis’ category for most resinous variety in 2012. Woody, earthy, and spicy notes give White Dragon a subtle aroma commonly found in the Kush family. An immediate wave of sedating relaxation and calming lethargy overcome the consumer, crushing sleeplessness, pain, and other severe symptoms. White Dragon buds finish flowering in 45 to 50 days indoors, or early October outdoors, and growers will be pleased to find heavy yields of THC-rich flowers waiting for them at harvest.
descriptionPlain: White Dragon is a pure indica strain bred by Eva Seeds through crossing Northern Lights and an Afghani indica. The result is a strain so potent, White Dragon won Spannabis’ category for most resinous variety in 2012. Woody, earthy, and spicy notes give White Dragon a subtle aroma commonly found in the Kush family. An immediate wave of sedating relaxation and calming lethargy overcome the consumer, crushing sleeplessness, pain, and other severe symptoms. White Dragon buds finish flowering in 45 to 50 days indoors, or early October outdoors, and growers will be pleased to find heavy yields of THC-rich flowers waiting for them at harvest.

highlightedReviews.text: Started medicating around 11:00 am this morning very good effects from this bud for my anxiety and for just clearing away negativity in the mind. This batch was in particular a purely indica strain and man does it do its job! Anxiety by about 2 pm gone and so is my paranoia from the ptsd, overall excellent experience highly recommend for those medical users looking for a good one hitter quitter indica that won't put you out for the remainder for your day (: 10/10

Amazing night time strain. Pain leaves your body and a nice tingle in the areas that usually cause pain. Hard to stay focused on the movie I'm watching but when I do I get a sudden rush of more high. Then my eyes focus back. Definitely not an optimal daytime strain as I had to fight the high to stay awake.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Hollywood OG, Critical Jack, Blackberry Lime Haze, Jamaican Dream, and White Dragon
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Looking for some new strains to help elevate your weekend plans? Whether you're an indica-lover, a die-hard sativa fan, or somewhere in between, we have recommendations! From Eva Seeds in Spain, we've added the pure indica White Dragon as well as their sativa-heavy Jamaican Dream. Critical Jack is a hybrid that combines the powerhouse indica Critical Mass with Jack Herer, one of the most adored sativa strains to ever bless our stash jars. Blackberry Lime Haze is an amazingly flavorful hybrid that offers a multitude of medical benefits, and all you Californians out there should keep an eye out for Hollywood OG, another potent hybrid from the OG family.
Already tried one of these? Give it some love by writing a review!
   1. Hollywood OG
Characteristics of Hollywood OG:

Indica-dominant hybrid
From southern California
Sweet, earthy, lemon and diesel aroma
Delivers strong, cerebrally focused effects
May help with pain, tension, and stress

   2. Critical Jack
Characteristics of Critical Jack:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Critical Mass and Jack Herer
Lemon, pine, and floral aroma
Light on the body and stimulating to the mind
May help with depression, appetite loss, and headaches
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

   3. Blackberry Lime Haze
Characteristics of Blackberry Lime Haze:

90% sativa 
Cross between Blackberry and Lime Haze
Sweet lime, peppery spice, honey, berry, and floral aroma
Brings high-energy, clear-headed, creative, and happy effects
May help with depression, headaches, fibromyalgia, spinal cord injury, multiple sclerosis, fatigue, pain, and spasms

   4. Jamaican Dream
Characteristics of Jamaican Dream:

90% sativa
Breeder: Eva Seeds
Jamaican genetics
Subtle and sweet aroma
Can elevate moods and bring weightless euphoria
May help with depression and fatigue
Indoor flowering time of 42 to 45 days

   5. White Dragon
Characteristics of White Dragon:

100% indica 
Breeder: Eva Seeds
Cross between Northern Lights and an Afghani indica
Woody, earthy, and spicy aroma
Delivers an immediate wave of sedating relaxation and calming lethargy
May help with sleeplessness and pain
Indoor flowering time of 45 to 50 days
